metadata.title: Gordini Women's Gore-tex Down Mitt
features: Breathable stretch woven shell with genuine goatskin finger area and accents; textured palm for enhanced grip; spot clean only
Waterproof, windproof, and breathable Gore-Tex insert; moisture-wicking lining
600-fill GooseDown insulation with 75% goose down and 25% goose feathers (back of hand); Megaloft synthetic insulation (palm)
Zippered handwarmer pocket; nose wipe; leash
Gauntlet cuff with drawcord closure; nose wipe; leash
description: Gordini's Gore-Tex Mitts are waterproof insulated mittens for women. Made with high quality materials and two types of insulation, winter’s coldest ski and snowboard days are no match for Gore-Tex Down mittens.Gordini의 고어텍스 장갑은 여성용 방수 단열 장갑입니다. 고품질 소재와 두 가지 유형의 단열재로 제작되었으며, 겨울의 가장 추운 스키와 스노보드에는 고어텍스 다운 장갑과 잘 어울립니다.
